name: zmodo
0:
”Alexa, show front door camera.”
”Alexa, show feed from the backyard camera.”
”Alexa, hide backyard camera.”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Zmodo cameras are designed to help you look after your home and family – even when you’re away. Now you can control your Zmodo camera using Alexa with your Echo Show.

With Zmodo skill and Alexa, you can now interact with your smart devices by voice.

To get started, select the "Enable Skill" button to link your Zmodo account and discover your Zmodo devices.

After connecting Alexa to your Zmodo Devices in a few simple steps, just say commands like:
• "Alexa, show front door camera"
• "Alexa, show feed from the backyard camera"
• "Alexa, hide backyard camera"
• "Alexa, turn on backyard camera"

Compatible Zmodo Cameras:
- Zmodo EZCam
- Zmodo Greet HD
- Zmodo Greet Pro
- Zmodo Outdoor Pro
- Zmodo Sight 180
- Zmodo Sight 180 C
- Zmodo Sight 180 Outdoor
- Zmodo Snap PT
- Zmodo Wireless Cam

 
Compatible Amazon Alexa Devices:
- Echo Show
- Echo Spot
